useCase.name: Register
useCase.description: Creating a new user account on the website.

preconditions.precondition: The registration page must be accessible.

successEndConditions.condition: The new user account is successfully saved in the system.

useCase.trigger: Client submits a registration form on the Registration Page.

mainSequence.step: Client submits a registration form on the Registration Page.
The Registration Page sends the registration request to the Register Activity.
The Register Activity saves a new user to the users database.
